name: GuinnessWorldRecords
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guinness world records
Developer Terms of Use
des: Record of the Day is a skill brought to you by Guinness World Records, the global authority on record-breaking. Each morning, Alexa will track down a record that was broken on this day. The results can be anything from a 2019 burrito-eating challenge to a steam-train race from the 1940s. In addition to the day's unique record, Alexa can draw random entries from the archives of GWR, which cover a wide range of categories including sports, pop culture and the natural world.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
